name: 苏格拉底
bio_short: 古希腊哲学家，西方哲学的奠基人之一。他本人没有留下任何著作，其思想主要通过学生柏拉图的对话录流传下来。他以“苏格拉底诘问法”和“未经审视的人生不值得过”而闻名。
bio_short_en: A Greek philosopher and a foundational figure of Western philosophy. He wrote nothing himself; his philosophy is known through the dialogues of his student, Plato. He is famous for the Socratic method and the phrase 'the unexamined life is not worth living.'
